plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite kind of plot is character-driven, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive, their favourite length is novel-length, their favourite topic is magic and mythology, their favourite pacing is slow and steady, their favourite narrative structure is third-person omniscient, and their favourite themes are death and rebirth, community and belonging, and the intersection of the mundane and the supernatural.
